predictions.text: On 2025-09-18, the Bank of England MPC vote split will include at least one member voting to keep Bank Rate unchanged.
predictions.verification_criteria: BoE Monetary Policy Summary and minutes dated 2025-09-18 show at least one vote for 'no change' in Bank Rate.
monitoring_signals: UK CPI and core CPI prints before the meeting
Gilt yield moves and OIS-implied cut odds
predictions.rationale: Inflation progress is uneven and growth is soft; prior MPC meetings frequently had dissent. At least one member is likely to prefer a slower easing pace.

predictions.text: ISM Services PMI for September 2025 will print between 50.0 and 52.5 in the 2025-10-03 release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Institute for Supply Management's official September 2025 Services ISM Report on Business headline PMI is between 50.0 and 52.5.
monitoring_signals: Small business hiring plans and input cost surveys
predictions.rationale: Consumer resilience is mixed; credit conditions are tightening at the margin. Services expansion likely continues but at a modest pace.

predictions.text: U.S. core PCE price index month-over-month for August 2025 will be between 0.1% and 0.2% in the BEA release on 2025-09-27.
predictions.verification_criteria: BEA Personal Income and Outlays release dated 2025-09-27 shows core PCE m/m change in [0.1%, 0.2%].
monitoring_signals: Unit labor costs and wage growth measures
predictions.rationale: Recent CPI/PPI components and nowcasts imply sticky-but-cooling core inflation, consistent with a 0.1–0.2% core PCE print.

predictions.text: The Freddie Mac Primary Mortgage Market Survey 15-year fixed mortgage rate will be at or below 5.85% in at least one weekly reading released by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: A Freddie Mac PMMS weekly report published on or before 2025-10-31 shows the 15-year fixed-rate mortgage average at or below 5.85%.
monitoring_signals: Fed policy guidance and balance sheet signals
predictions.rationale: A Fed cut and easing term premia could flow through to MBS yields, nudging mortgage rates lower at the margin.

predictions.text: The ICE BofA US High Yield Option-Adjusted Spread (FRED: BAMLH0A0HYM2) will reach at or above 4.50% on at least one day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series BAMLH0A0HYM2 daily reading shows a value ≥ 4.50% on or before 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Macro surprise indices and earnings revisions
predictions.rationale: Policy uncertainty and softer growth can widen risk premia from tight starting points.

predictions.text: The LBMA Gold Price PM will fix at or above $2,550 per troy ounce on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: LBMA Gold Price PM daily fix shows a level ≥ $2,550/oz on or before 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Geopolitical escalation headlines and ETF flows
predictions.rationale: Lower real yields and elevated geopolitical risk support a test of higher gold levels.

predictions.text: For the week ending 2025-09-27, EIA will report a U.S. working natural gas storage change between +75 and +100 Bcf in the Weekly Natural Gas Storage Report released by 2025-10-03.
predictions.verification_criteria: EIA Weekly Natural Gas Storage Report covering week ending 2025-09-27 shows a net injection within +75 to +100 Bcf.
monitoring_signals: Lower-48 dry gas production and LNG feedgas
Regional basis spreads (e.g., Henry Hub vs. Permian)
predictions.rationale: Shoulder-season injections with robust production and moderate weather imply a sizable build.

predictions.text: U.S. Industrial Production month-over-month for September 2025 will be between -0.2% and +0.3% in the Federal Reserve G.17 release on 2025-10-16.
predictions.verification_criteria: Federal Reserve G.17 release dated 2025-10-16 shows total Industrial Production m/m in [-0.2%, +0.3%].
monitoring_signals: ISM Manufacturing PMI and production subindex
predictions.rationale: Manufacturing remains soft but stabilizing; utilities output should be range-bound, keeping headline IP near flat.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, the CFPB will announce at least one enforcement action or consent order involving a Buy-Now-Pay-Later provider.
predictions.verification_criteria: A CFPB press release or consent order posted on consumerfinance.gov by 2025-10-31 names a BNPL provider as a subject of enforcement.
monitoring_signals: CFPB enforcement docket and press releases
State AG actions against BNPL firms
predictions.rationale: Heightened scrutiny of BNPL risk and disclosures increases near-term enforcement likelihood.

predictions.text: USD/JPY (Yahoo Finance: JPY=X) will close at or above 152.50 on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Yahoo Finance historical data for JPY=X shows a daily close ≥ 152.50 on or before 2025-10-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: BoJ policy guidance and YCC tweaks
predictions.rationale: Relative rate differentials remain wide even with a Fed cut; absent forceful intervention, yen weakness can re-test highs.
